phrase: The path you're afraid to take often leads to the place you truly belong.
author: Felipe

phrase: Your future self will thank you for the courage you show today.
author: Felipe

phrase: Something wonderful is on its way, even if you cannot see it yet.
author: Felipe

phrase: You are closer to a breakthrough than you think. Keep moving.
author: Felipe

phrase: The universe whispers answers in silence. Slow down and listen.
author: Felipe

phrase: Good things are coming. Stay patient, stay open, stay brave.
author: Felipe

phrase: Life rewards those who dare to dream boldly and act fearlessly.
author: Felipe

phrase: A small decision today will open a big opportunity tomorrow.
author: Felipe

phrase: Your energy attracts your destiny. Protect it and shape it wisely.
author: Felipe
